# multilink

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

multilink implements methodology for multifile record linkage and duplicate detection.

## Installation

You can install the released version of multilink from GitHub with:

``` r
install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("aleshing/multilink")
```

## Example


```{r example}
library(multilink)
## basic example code
```
